title: Behaviour Driven Development
summary:
Writing software in an organisation or for ourselves, many people feel
that they "should" somehow be doing Test Driven Development (TDD)
because "everybody else" is and it's cool, somewhere between necessary
and useful and they heard testing was good. When informed that must of
TDD isn't about testing (despite the name!), confusion reigns. Behaviour
Driven Development is a different way of approaching the "how to
validate your code" problem.
